title: Adj straight axle springplates for 65 bus

posts.content: As it says, just can't get both sides spot on by adjusting splines alone ( never been right if I'm honest since it was installed by a professional) around an inch difference between the sides (probably not helping ride) so looking to see if anyone has any second hand ones kicking around.

I had the same problem on mine, uneven

if your splines slide in and out the spring plate easily, its not hard to sort
just pick a side and turn the inner by 1 spline and the outer x1 spline the opposite way…. continue doing this and after maximum of x5 attempts you will have found the right combination

if your spring plates done slide off the splines easily….just buy some adjustable ones LOL
cheers may have a look. nothing to lose and may save a few £'s
